A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie accomplished nothing. We are back where the force awaken ended.  You can skip this movie and miss nothing important and probably watch the next one without missing a beat.  So many things gone wrong that could of been right.  A disgrace for Star Wars fans and I'm not even a hardcore wars fan. Don't know if there were creative differences with Disney and the director or just Disney being safe and take no chances.  This really took the whole saga a step back. Just hope JJ can take it to the next level on the next episode.
